sqlMap.select:
select * from ZC_EB_EVAL_REPORT ZC_EB_EVAL_REPORT where 1=1
ZC_EB_EVAL_REPORT.ND=#nd#
exists (select instance_id from V_WF_CURRENT_TASK_ZC_TODO where executor =#executor# and instance_id = ZC_EB_EVAL_REPORT.process_inst_id)
exists ( select instance_id from V_WF_CURRENT_TASK_ZC_UNTREAD where executor =#executor# and
instance_id = ZC_EB_EVAL_REPORT.process_inst_id)
status='save'
exists (select instance_id from V_WF_ACTION_HISTORY_GK53 where executor = #executor# and instance_id = ZC_EB_EVAL_REPORT.process_inst_id) and status='exec'
exists (select instance_id from V_WF_ACTION_HISTORY_GK53 where executor = #executor# and instance_id = ZC_EB_EVAL_REPORT.process_inst_id) and status!='back' and status!='exec' and status!='cancel'
(exists (select WF_DRAFT_NAME from as_wf_draft where user_id=#executor# and compo_id=#wfcompoId# and WF_DRAFT_ID=ZC_EB_EVAL_REPORT.process_inst_id) or ZC_EB_EVAL_REPORT.process_inst_id is null) and status!='cancel'
1=1 status='cancel'
ZC_EB_EVAL_REPORT.status =#billStatus:VARCHAR#
ZC_EB_EVAL_REPORT.PROJ_CODE =#projCode:VARCHAR#
ZC_EB_EVAL_REPORT.PACK_CODE =#packCode:VARCHAR#
order by ZC_EB_EVAL_REPORT.EXECUTE_DATE desc

SELECT T.* FROM (SELECT proj_code, proj_name, pack_code, pack_name, provider_name, PROVIDER_CODE, pur_type, REPORT_CODE, EXECUTOR, status, remark, RECORD_CODE, EXECUTE_DATE, PROCESS_INST_ID, Nd nd, BID_LOCATION, PUR_PEOPLE, BID_DATE, IS_GOON_AUDIT, BID_SUM, CO_CODE, CO_NAME, ZC_CO_LINKMAN, AGENCY, ORG_CODE FROM ZC_EB_EVAL_REPORT where ZC_EB_EVAL_REPORT.pur_type!='5' union select p.proj_code, p.proj_name, p.pack_code, p.pack_name, p.WIN_BID_PROVIDER_NAME, p.WIN_BID_PROVIDER_CODE, '5' pur_type, p.RFQ_CODE REPORT_CODE, p.CREATOR EXECUTOR, p.status, '' remark, '' RECORD_CODE, p.CREATE_DATE, p.PROCESS_INST_ID, p.Nd nd, '' BID_LOCATION, '' PUR_PEOPLE, p.OPEN_BID_DATE, p.IS_GOON_AUDIT, p.WIN_BID_SUM, e.co_code, m.co_name, m.link_man, p.AGENCY, p.ORG_CODE from zc_eb_rfq_pack p,zc_eb_pack k,zc_eb_entrust e,ma_company m where p.pack_code=k.pack_code and k.entrust_code=e.sn and e.co_code=m.co_code and e.nd=m.nd ) T WHERE t.status!='cancel' and t.provider_code is not null T.EXECUTOR=#userId:VARCHAR# and not exists( select 1 from zc_eb_notice n where n.pack_code=t.pack_code )

SELECT V_ZC_EB_EVAL_PACK.PACK_CODE, V_ZC_EB_EVAL_PACK.PACK_NAME, V_ZC_EB_EVAL_PACK.PACK_DESC, V_ZC_EB_EVAL_PACK.STATUS, V_ZC_EB_EVAL_PACK.PROJ_CODE, V_ZC_EB_EVAL_PACK.PROJ_NAME, V_ZC_EB_EVAL_PACK.CO_CODE, V_ZC_EB_EVAL_PACK.AGENCY, V_ZC_EB_EVAL_PACK.FILE_ID, V_ZC_EB_EVAL_PACK.FORMULA_CODE, V_ZC_EB_EVAL_PACK.FACTOR_TYPE, V_ZC_EB_EVAL_PACK.FORMULA_NAME, V_ZC_EB_EVAL_PACK.EVAL_LEADER FROM V_ZC_EB_EVAL_PACK V_ZC_EB_EVAL_PACK WHERE 1=1 V_ZC_EB_EVAL_PACK.EXPERT_CODE=#userId:VARCHAR#
V_ZC_EB_EVAL_PACK.ND = #nd#
V_ZC_EB_EVAL_PACK.STATUS in('2','3','4')
V_ZC_EB_EVAL_PACK.STATUS in('2','3','4') and V_ZC_EB_EVAL_PACK.FACTOR_TYPE!='2'
V_ZC_EB_EVAL_PACK.STATUS='4'
V_ZC_EB_EVAL_PACK.PACK_CODE=#packCode:VARCHAR#
V_ZC_EB_EVAL_PACK.PROJ_CODE=#projCode:VARCHAR#
ORDER BY V_ZC_EB_EVAL_PACK.PROJ_CODE DESC

SELECT R.*, I.NAME ITEM_NAME, I.PARENT_ITEM_CODE, I.DESCRIPTION DESCRIPTION, I.IS_ADD_SCORE, I.STANDARD_SCORE, I.BASE_SCORE, I.MAX_ADD_SCORE, I.MAX_MINUS_SCORE, I.LEAST_SCORE, I.IS_PRICE_TARGET, I.WEIGHT, I.FORMULA, I.REMARK FORMULA_ITEM_REMARK FROM ZC_EB_EVAL_RESULT R JOIN ZC_EB_FORMULA_ITEM I ON I.ITEM_CODE =R.ITEM_CODE AND I.FORMULA_CODE = R.FORMULA_CODE AND I.ITEM_CODE = #ITEM_CODE:VARCHAR# AND I.ITEM_TYPE = #ITEM_TYPE:VARCHAR# WHERE R.EVAL_EXPERT_CODE = #EVAL_EXPERT_CODE:VARCHAR# AND R.FORMULA_CODE= #FORMULA_CODE:VARCHAR# AND R.PROVIDER_CODE = #PROVIDER_CODE:VARCHAR# AND R.PACK_CODE = #PACK_CODE:VARCHAR# AND R.PROJ_CODE = #PROJ_CODE:VARCHAR# AND R.ITEM_CODE = #ITEM_CODE:VARCHAR#
SELECT * FROM ZC_EB_EVAL_REPORT WHERE REPORT_CODE=#reportCode:VARCHAR#
SELECT * FROM ZC_EB_EVAL_REPORT WHERE PROJ_CODE=#projCode:VARCHAR# AND PACK_CODE=#packCode:VARCHAR#
SELECT * FROM ZC_EB_EVAL_REPORT WHERE PROCESS_INST_ID=#value#
SELECT * FROM ZC_EB_EVAL_REPORT REPORT_CODE in #pmAdjustCodeList[]#

SELECT R.*, I.NAME ITEM_NAME, I.PARENT_ITEM_CODE, I.DESCRIPTION DESCRIPTION, I.IS_ADD_SCORE, I.STANDARD_SCORE, I.BASE_SCORE, I.MAX_ADD_SCORE, I.MAX_MINUS_SCORE, I.LEAST_SCORE, I.IS_PRICE_TARGET, I.WEIGHT, I.FORMULA, I.REMARK FORMULA_ITEM_REMARK FROM ZC_EB_EVAL_RESULT R JOIN ZC_EB_FORMULA_ITEM I ON I.ITEM_CODE(+) = R.ITEM_CODE
I.PARENT_ITEM_CODE = #PARENT_ITEM_CODE:VARCHAR#
R.ITEM_CODE = #ITEM_CODE:VARCHAR#
AND R.ITEM_TYPE = #ITEM_TYPE:VARCHAR#
R.EVAL_EXPERT_CODE =#EVAL_EXPERT_CODE#
R.FORMULA_CODE =#FORMULA_CODE#
R.PROVIDER_CODE =#PROVIDER_CODE#
R.PACK_CODE =#PACK_CODE#
R.PROJ_CODE =#PROJ_CODE#

SELECT '' RESULT_CODE,''PROJ_CODE,'' PACK_CODE, '' PROVIDER_NAME, T.PARENT_ITEM_CODE,T.ITEM_CODE,T.NAME ITEM_NAME,T.IS_ADD_SCORE,T.MAX_ADD_SCORE,T.MAX_MINUS_SCORE,T.STANDARD_SCORE, T.BASE_SCORE,T.ITEM_TYPE,T.FORMULA_CODE,T.LEAST_SCORE,T.FORMULA,T.DESCRIPTION,T.IS_PRICE_TARGET, T.WEIGHT,T.INDX,T.REMARK FORMULA_ITEM_REMARK, null PROVIDER_CODE,null EVAL_EXPERT,NULL EVAL_DATE,null COMPLIANCE_EVAL_VALUE,null COMPLIANCE_UNPASS_REASON, null EXPERT_EVAL_SCORE,null ADJUST_SCORE,null ADJUST_REASON,null EVAL_RESULT,null IS_COMPOSITE_RESULT,null REMARK,null EVAL_EXPERT_CODE FROM ZC_EB_FORMULA_ITEM T WHERE T.FORMULA_CODE=#FORMULA_CODE:VARCHAR# AND T.ITEM_TYPE=#ITEM_TYPE:VARCHAR#
START WITH T.PARENT_ITEM_CODE =#ITEM_CODE:VARCHAR# CONNECT BY PRIOR T.ITEM_CODE = T.PARENT_ITEM_CODE
sqlMap.insert: insert into ZC_EB_EVAL_RESULT (RESULT_CODE, FORMULA_CODE, PROVIDER_CODE, ITEM_CODE, INDX, ITEM_TYPE, EVAL_EXPERT, EVAL_DATE, COMPLIANCE_EVAL_VALUE, COMPLIANCE_UNPASS_REASON, EXPERT_EVAL_SCORE, ADJUST_SCORE, ADJUST_REASON, EVAL_RESULT, IS_COMPOSITE_RESULT, REMARK, EVAL_EXPERT_CODE,PROVIDER_NAME,PACK_CODE,PROJ_CODE) values (#resultCode:VARCHAR#, #formulaCode:VARCHAR#, #providerCode:VARCHAR#, #itemCode:VARCHAR#, #indx:INTEGER#, #itemType:VARCHAR#, #evalExpert:VARCHAR#, #evalDate:TIMESTAMP#, #complianceEvalValue:VARCHAR#, #complianceUnpassReason:VARCHAR#, #expertEvalScore:DECIMAL#, #adjustScore:DECIMAL#, #adjustReason:VARCHAR#, #evalResult:VARCHAR#, #isCompositeResult:VARCHAR#, #remark:VARCHAR#, #evalExpertCode:VARCHAR#,#providerName:VARCHAR#,#packCode:VARCHAR#,#projCode:VARCHAR#)

INSERT INTO ZC_EB_EVAL_REPORT( REPORT_CODE,PROJ_NAME,PROJ_CODE, PACK_CODE,PACK_NAME,RECORD_CODE, REMARK,EXECUTOR,TSQK_DESCRIPTION, EVAL_DESCRIPTION,REPORT_ATTACH_BLOBID, SIGN_REPORT_ATTACH_BLOBID, EXECUTE_DATE,BID_DATE,BID_LOCATION, PUR_TYPE, SUPERVISE_OPINION, CALL_BID_OPINION,PROVIDER_NAME,PROVIDER_CODE, BID_EVAL_OPINION,PROCESS_INST_ID,ND,IS_GOON_AUDIT,STATUS,BID_SUM, CO_CODE,CO_NAME,ZC_CO_LINKMAN,AGENCY,EXPERT_OPINION,ORG_CODE )values( #reportCode:VARCHAR#,#projName:VARCHAR#,#projCode:VARCHAR#, #packCode:VARCHAR#,#packName:VARCHAR#,#recordCode:VARCHAR#, #remark:VARCHAR#,#executor:VARCHAR#,#tsqkDescription:VARCHAR#, #evalDescription:VARCHAR#,#reportAttachBlobid:VARCHAR#,#signReportAttachBlobid:VARCHAR#, #executeDate:VARCHAR#,#bidDate:VARCHAR#,#bidLocation:VARCHAR#, #purType:VARCHAR#,#superviseOpinion:VARCHAR#, #callBidOpinion:VARCHAR#,#providerName:VARCHAR#,#providerCode:VARCHAR#, #bidEvalOpinion:VARCHAR#,#processInstId#,#nd:VARCHAR#,#isGoonAudit#,#status#,#bidSum#, #coCode:VARCHAR#,#coName:VARCHAR#,#zcCoLinkMan:VARCHAR#,#agency:VARCHAR#,#expertOpinion#,#orgCode# )
sqlMap.update: update ZC_EB_EVAL_RESULT set PROVIDER_CODE = #providerCode:VARCHAR#, ITEM_CODE = #itemCode:VARCHAR#, INDX = #indx:INTEGER#, ITEM_TYPE = #itemType:VARCHAR#, EVAL_EXPERT = #evalExpert:VARCHAR#, EVAL_DATE = #evalDate:TIMESTAMP#, COMPLIANCE_EVAL_VALUE = #complianceEvalValue:VARCHAR#, COMPLIANCE_UNPASS_REASON = #complianceUnpassReason:VARCHAR#, EXPERT_EVAL_SCORE = #expertEvalScore:DECIMAL#, ADJUST_SCORE = #adjustScore:DECIMAL#, ADJUST_REASON = #adjustReason:VARCHAR#, EVAL_RESULT = IS_COMPOSITE_RESULT = #isCompositeResult:VARCHAR#, REMARK = #remark:VARCHAR#, EVAL_EXPERT_CODE = #evalExpertCode:VARCHAR#, FORMULA_CODE = #formulaCode:VARCHAR#, PROVIDER_NAME = #providerName:VARCHAR#, PACK_CODE=#packCode:VARCHAR#, PROJ_CODE=#projCode:VARCHAR# where RESULT_CODE = #resultCode:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.delete:
delete from ZC_EB_EVAL_RESULT ZT where ZT.Pack_Code=#packCode:VARCHAR# AND ZT.PROJ_CODE=#projCode:VARCHAR#
ZT.PROVIDER_CODE=#providerCode:VARCHAR#
ZT.Eval_Expert_Code=#evalExpertCode:VARCHAR#
ZT.ITEM_TYPE=#itemType:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.update: update ZC_EB_EVAL_REPORT set PROJ_NAME=#projName:VARCHAR#, PROJ_CODE =#projCode:VARCHAR#, PACK_CODE =#packCode:VARCHAR#, PACK_NAME =#packName:VARCHAR#, RECORD_CODE =#recordCode:VARCHAR#, REMARK =#remark:VARCHAR#, EXECUTOR =#executor:VARCHAR#, TSQK_DESCRIPTION =#tsqkDescription:VARCHAR#, EVAL_DESCRIPTION =#evalDescription:VARCHAR#, REPORT_ATTACH_BLOBID =#reportAttachBlobid:VARCHAR#, SIGN_REPORT_ATTACH_BLOBID =#signReportAttachBlobid:VARCHAR#, EXECUTE_DATE =#executeDate:VARCHAR#, BID_DATE =#bidDate:VARCHAR#, BID_LOCATION =#bidLocation:VARCHAR#, PUR_TYPE =#purType:VARCHAR#, SUPERVISE_OPINION =#superviseOpinion:VARCHAR#, CALL_BID_OPINION=#callBidOpinion:VARCHAR#, PROVIDER_NAME =#providerName:VARCHAR#, BID_EVAL_OPINION =#bidEvalOpinion:VARCHAR#, PROCESS_INST_ID=#processInstId#, STATUS=#status:VARCHAR#, PROVIDER_CODE=#providerCode:VARCHAR#, IS_GOON_AUDIT=#isGoonAudit#, BID_SUM=#bidSum#, CO_CODE=#coCode:VARCHAR#, CO_NAME=#coName:VARCHAR#, ZC_CO_LINKMAN=#zcCoLinkMan:VARCHAR#, AGENCY=#agency:VARCHAR#, EXPERT_OPINION=#expertOpinion#, ORG_CODE=#orgCode:VARCHAR# where REPORT_CODE = #reportCode:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT S.PROJ_CODE, S.PROVIDER_CODE,S.PROVIDER_NAME,SP.PACK_CODE,P.PACK_NAME,P.STATUS, SP.BID_DOC_ID,CASE WHEN nvl(sp.ecbj_sum,0) > 0 THEN SP.ECBJ_SUM ELSE SP.BID_SUM END BID_SUM FROM ZC_EB_SIGNUP S , ZC_EB_SIGNUP_PACK SP , ZC_EB_PACK P WHERE SP.SIGNUP_ID=S.SIGNUP_ID AND P.PACK_CODE=SP.PACK_CODE AND SP.BID_DOC_ID is not null AND SP.OPEN_BID_STATUS='1'
S.PROVIDER_CODE =#PROVIDER_CODE#
S.PROVIDER_CODE in( SELECT ZR.PROVIDER_CODE FROM ZC_EB_PACK_EVAL_RESULT ZR WHERE ZR.COMPLIANCE_EVAL_RESULT='Y' AND ZR.PROJ_CODE=S.PROJ_CODE AND ZR.PACK_CODE=SP.PACK_CODE)
P.STATUS =#packStatus#
AND SP.PACK_CODE=#PACK_CODE:VARCHAR# AND P.PROJ_CODE=#PROJ_CODE:VARCHAR# AND S.PROJ_CODE=#PROJ_CODE:VARCHAR# ORDER BY S.PROVIDER_CODE desc

SELECT S.PROJ_CODE, S.PROVIDER_CODE,S.PROVIDER_NAME,SP.PACK_CODE,P.PACK_NAME,SP.BID_DOC_ID,P.STATUS, SP.BID_DOC_ID,CASE WHEN nvl(sp.ecbj_sum,0) > 0 THEN SP.ECBJ_SUM ELSE SP.BID_SUM END BID_SUM FROM ZC_EB_SIGNUP S , ZC_EB_SIGNUP_PACK SP , ZC_EB_PACK P WHERE SP.SIGNUP_ID=S.SIGNUP_ID AND P.PACK_CODE=SP.PACK_CODE AND SP.OPEN_BID_STATUS='1' AND SP.PACK_CODE=#packCode:VARCHAR# AND P.PROJ_CODE=#projCode:VARCHAR# AND S.PROJ_CODE=#projCode:VARCHAR#
S.PROVIDER_CODE =#zcText0#
exists (select 1 from zc_eb_pack_eval_result r where r.proj_code=s.proj_code and r.provider_code =s.provider_code and r.pack_code=sp.pack_code and r.is_composite_result='Y' and r.compliance_eval_value='1')
P.STATUS =#status#
ORDER BY S.PROVIDER_CODE desc
SELECT P.*,''PACK_CODE,''PROJ_CODE,''SETTOR,''SETDATE FROM ZC_EB_FORMULA_PARAM P WHERE P.FORMULA_CODE=#formulaCode:VARCHAR# ORDER BY p.PARAM_CODE

SELECT PV.*,P.PARAM_NAME,P.DEFAULT_VALUE,P.IS_MAN_SET,P.DESCRIPTION FROM ZC_EB_EVAL_PARAM PV JOIN ZC_EB_FORMULA_PARAM P ON P.PARAM_CODE=PV.PARAM_CODE AND P.FORMULA_CODE=PV.FORMULA_CODE WHERE PV.FORMULA_CODE=#formulaCode:VARCHAR# AND PV.PACK_CODE=#packCode:VARCHAR# AND PV.PROJ_CODE=#projCode:VARCHAR# ORDER BY pv.PARAM_CODE
sqlMap.insert: insert into ZC_EB_EVAL_PARAM (FORMULA_CODE, PACK_CODE,PROJ_CODE,SETTOR,SETDATE, PARAM_CODE, VALUE) values (#formulaCode:VARCHAR#, #packCode:VARCHAR#,#projCode:VARCHAR#,#settor:VARCHAR#,#setDate:VARCHAR# ,#paramCode:VARCHAR#,#value:VARCHAR#)
sqlMap.update: update ZC_EB_EVAL_PARAM set VALUE = #value:VARCHAR# where FORMULA_CODE =#formulaCode:VARCHAR# and PACK_CODE = #packCode:VARCHAR# and PARAM_CODE= #paramCode:VARCHAR# and PROJ_CODE=#projCode:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.delete: delete from ZC_EB_EVAL_PARAM where FORMULA_CODE =#formulaCode:VARCHAR# and PACK_CODE = #packCode:VARCHAR# and PARAM_CODE= #paramCode:VARCHAR# and PROJ_CODE=#projCode:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT R.*, I.NAME ITEM_NAME, I.PARENT_ITEM_CODE, I.DESCRIPTION DESCRIPTION, I.IS_ADD_SCORE, I.STANDARD_SCORE, I.BASE_SCORE, I.MAX_ADD_SCORE, I.MAX_MINUS_SCORE, I.LEAST_SCORE, I.IS_PRICE_TARGET, I.WEIGHT, I.FORMULA, I.REMARK FORMULA_ITEM_REMARK FROM ZC_EB_EVAL_RESULT R JOIN ZC_EB_FORMULA_ITEM I ON I.ITEM_CODE(+)=R.ITEM_CODE where 1=1
upper(R.is_composite_result) ='Y'
(upper(R.is_composite_result) !='Y' OR R.IS_COMPOSITE_RESULT IS NULL)
R.ITEM_TYPE=#zcText1:VARCHAR# R.ITEM_CODE=#dattr1:VARCHAR#
R.EVAL_EXPERT_CODE=#zcText2:VARCHAR#
R.PROVIDER_CODE=#zcText3:VARCHAR#
AND R.FORMULA_CODE=#zcText0:VARCHAR# AND R.PACK_CODE =#packCode:VARCHAR# AND R.PROJ_CODE =#projCode:VARCHAR#
ORDER BY R.PROVIDER_CODE,R.EVAL_EXPERT_CODE, R.EXPERT_EVAL_SCORE desc

SELECT R.*, I.NAME ITEM_NAME, I.PARENT_ITEM_CODE, I.DESCRIPTION DESCRIPTION, I.IS_ADD_SCORE, I.STANDARD_SCORE, I.BASE_SCORE, I.MAX_ADD_SCORE, I.MAX_MINUS_SCORE, I.LEAST_SCORE, I.IS_PRICE_TARGET, I.WEIGHT FROM ZC_EB_EVAL_RESULT R JOIN ZC_EB_FORMULA_ITEM I ON I.ITEM_CODE=R.ITEM_CODE AND I.FORMULA_CODE=R.FORMULA_CODE WHERE I.ITEM_TYPE =#ITEM_TYPE:VARCHAR# AND I.PARENT_ITEM_CODE = #PARENT_ITEM_CODE:VARCHAR# AND I.FORMULA_CODE = #FORMULA_CODE:VARCHAR# AND R.PACK_CODE = #PACK_CODE:VARCHAR# ORDER BY R.PROVIDER_CODE, R.EVAL_EXPERT_CODE,R.EXPERT_EVAL_SCORE DESC

SELECT I.NAME ITEM_NAME, I.DESCRIPTION, R.PROVIDER_CODE, R.PROVIDER_NAME, R.EVAL_EXPERT, SUM(R.EXPERT_EVAL_SCORE) EXPERT_EVAL_SCORE FROM ZC_EB_EVAL_RESULT R JOIN ZC_EB_FORMULA_ITEM I ON I.ITEM_CODE = R.ITEM_CODE AND I.FORMULA_CODE = R.FORMULA_CODE WHERE I.ITEM_TYPE = #ITEM_TYPE:VARCHAR# AND I.PARENT_ITEM_CODE = #PARENT_ITEM_CODE:VARCHAR# AND I.FORMULA_CODE = #FORMULA_CODE:VARCHAR# AND R.PACK_CODE = #PACK_CODE:VARCHAR# GROUP BY I.NAME, I.DESCRIPTION, R.PROVIDER_CODE, R.PROVIDER_NAME,R.EVAL_EXPERT ORDER BY R.PROVIDER_CODE, EXPERT_EVAL_SCORE DESC

SELECT ZT.EVAL_EXPERT_CODE EXPERT_CODE, MIN(EVAL_EXPERT)EXPERT_NAME FROM ZC_EB_EVAL_RESULT ZT WHERE ZT.PACK_CODE=#packCode# AND ZT.PROJ_CODE=#projCode# AND ZT.ITEM_TYPE=#zcText1# GROUP BY ZT.EVAL_EXPERT_CODE

SELECT ZR1.PROVIDER_CODE, ZR1.PROVIDER_NAME, ZR1.PACK_CODE, ZR1.PROJ_CODE, ZR1.FORMULA_CODE, ZR1.Compliance_Eval_Value, ZR1.Eval_Expert_Code as EXPERT_CODE, ZR1.Eval_Expert as EXPERT_NAME, ZR1.Is_Compliance_Result, ZR1.ITEM_CODE, ZR1.Compliance_Unpass_Reason, ZR1.Provider_Name, CASE WHEN ZR1.COMPLIANCE_EVAL_VALUE='2' THEN 0 ELSE (SELECT ZR2.Expert_Eval_Score FROM Zc_Eb_Eval_Result ZR2 WHERE ZR2.PACK_CODE = ZR1.PACK_CODE AND ZR2.PROJ_CODE = ZR1.PROJ_CODE AND ZR2.Is_Composite_Result='Y' AND ZR2.Item_Code='SC' AND ZR2.PROVIDER_CODE = ZR1.PROVIDER_CODE AND ZR2.EVAL_EXPERT_CODE=ZR1.EVAL_EXPERT_CODE ) END EVAL_SCORE FROM Zc_Eb_Eval_Result ZR1 WHERE ZR1.Is_Composite_Result='Y' AND ZR1.Item_Code='CP'
PROJ_CODE =#PROJ_CODE#
PACK_CODE =#PACK_CODE#
PROVIDER_CODE =#PROVIDER_CODE#
ZR1.IS_COMPLIANCE_RESULT =#IS_COMPLIANCE_RESULT#
ORDER BY EVAL_SCORE DESC
sqlMap.delete:
DELETE FROM ZC_EB_PACK_EVAL_RESULT PR WHERE PR.IS_COMPOSITE_RESULT='Y'
PROJ_CODE =#PROJ_CODE#
PACK_CODE =#PACK_CODE#
PROVIDER_CODE =#PROVIDER_CODE#
sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM ZC_EB_PACK_SUM_CALCULATOR C WHERE C.CAL_WAY_ID=#CAL_WAY_ID#

SELECT * FROM ZC_EB_PACK_EVAL_RESULT ZT WHERE 1=1
ZT.PROJ_CODE =#PROJ_CODE#
ZT.PACK_CODE =#PACK_CODE#
ZT.IS_COMPLIANCE_RESULT=#IS_COMPLIANCE_RESULT#
order by ZT.EVAL_SCORE desc
sqlMap.insert: insert into ZC_EB_PACK_EVAL_RESULT (RESULT_CODE, PROJ_CODE, PACK_CODE, PROVIDER_CODE, PROVIDER_NAME, PROVIDER_TOTAL_PRICE, EVAL_SCORE, COMPLIANCE_EVAL_RESULT, EVAL_RESULT, IS_COMPLIANCE_RESULT, ADJUST_SCORE, COMPLIANCE_EVAL_VALUE, COMPLIANCE_UNPASS_REASON, REMARK, EXPERT_CODE, EXPERT_NAME, SUM_WAY ) values (#resultCode:VARCHAR#, #projCode:VARCHAR#, #packCode:VARCHAR#, #providerCode:VARCHAR#, #providerName:VARCHAR#, #providerTotalPrice:DECIMAL#, #evalScore:DECIMAL#, #complianceEvalResult:VARCHAR#, #evalResult:VARCHAR#, #isComplianceResult:VARCHAR#, #adjustScore:DECIMAL#, #complianceEvalValue:VARCHAR#, #complianceUnpassReason:VARCHAR#, #remark:VARCHAR#, #expertCode:VARCHAR#, #expertName:VARCHAR#, #sumWay:VARCHAR#)
sqlMap.update: update ZC_EB_PACK_EVAL_RESULT set EVAL_RESULT = #evalResult:VARCHAR#, EVAL_SCORE = #evalScore:DECIMAL#, ADJUST_SCORE = #adjustScore:DECIMAL#, REMARK = #remark:VARCHAR#, COMPLIANCE_EVAL_VALUE= #complianceEvalValue:VARCHAR#, COMPLIANCE_UNPASS_REASON= #complianceUnpassReason:VARCHAR#, PROVIDER_TOTAL_PRICE= #providerTotalPrice:DECIMAL#, SUM_WAY= #sumWay:VARCHAR# where RESULT_CODE = #resultCode:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.delete:
delete from ZC_EB_PACK_EVAL_RESULT where PROJ_CODE=#projCode:VARCHAR# AND PACK_CODE=#packCode:VARCHAR#
PROVIDER_CODE=#providerCode:VARCHAR#
IS_COMPLIANCE_RESULT=#IS_COMPLIANCE_RESULT#
sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM ZC_EB_PACK_EVAL_RESULT t where t.is_composite_result='Y' and PROJ_CODE =#PROJ_CODE# and PACK_CODE =#PACK_CODE# and PROVIDER_CODE =#PROVIDER_CODE#

SELECT PROVIDER_CODE, PROVIDER_NAME, PACK_CODE, PROJ_CODE, FORMULA_CODE, Compliance_Eval_Value, Eval_Expert_Code as EXPERT_CODE, Eval_Expert as EXPERT_NAME, IS_COMPLIANCE_RESULT, EXPERT_EVAL_SCORE as EVAL_SCORE, ITEM_CODE, PROVIDER_NAME, COMPLIANCE_UNPASS_REASON FROM ZC_EB_EVAL_RESULT
EVAL_EXPERT_CODE =#EVAL_EXPERT_CODE#
FORMULA_CODE =#FORMULA_CODE#
PROVIDER_CODE =#PROVIDER_CODE#
PACK_CODE =#PACK_CODE#
PROJ_CODE =#PROJ_CODE#
ITEM_CODE =#ITEM_CODE#
ORDER BY PROVIDER_CODE desc

select k.*, CASE WHEN LEAD(LEVELS) OVER(ORDER BY RN) > LEVELS THEN 0 ELSE 1 END ISLEAF from ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, a.*, level LEVELS, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZC_EB_FORMULA_ITEM B WHERE LEVEL = (SELECT MAX(LEVEL) FROM ZC_EB_FORMULA_ITEM C START WITH C.ITEM_CODE = A.ITEM_CODE CONNECT BY PRIOR C.ITEM_CODE = C.PARENT_ITEM_CODE) START WITH B.ITEM_CODE = A.ITEM_CODE CONNECT BY PRIOR B.ITEM_CODE = B.PARENT_ITEM_CODE) as leafcount FROM ZC_EB_FORMULA_ITEM a WHERE FORMULA_CODE = (select FORMULA_CODE from ZC_EB_FORMULA where PROJ_CODE = #PROJ_CODE:VARCHAR# and PACK_CODE = #PACK_CODE:VARCHAR#) AND ITEM_TYPE = #ITEM_TYPE:VARCHAR# START WITH PARENT_ITEM_CODE = #ITEM_CODE:VARCHAR# CONNECT BY PRIOR ITEM_CODE = PARENT_ITEM_CODE ) k
sqlMap.insert: insert into ZC_EB_EXPERT_OPINION (PROJ_CODE, PACK_CODE,PROJ_NAME,PACK_NAME, OPINION, TIME,EXPERT_CODE,EXPERT_NAME) values (#projCode:VARCHAR#, #packCode:VARCHAR#,#projName:VARCHAR#,#packName:VARCHAR#,#opinion:VARCHAR#,#time:DATE# ,#expertCode:VARCHAR#,#expertName:VARCHAR#)
sqlMap.delete: delete from ZC_EB_EXPERT_OPINION where PROJ_CODE = #projCode:VARCHAR# and PACK_CODE = #packCode:VARCHAR# and EXPERT_CODE = #expertCode:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select:
select * from ZC_EB_EXPERT_OPINION where 1=1
PROJ_CODE = #projCode:VARCHAR#
PACK_CODE = #packCode:VARCHAR#
select * from ZC_EB_EXPERT_OPINION where PROJ_CODE = #projCode:VARCHAR# and PACK_CODE = #packCode:VARCHAR# and EXPERT_CODE=#expertCode:VARCHAR#

select distinct PROJ.* from ZC_EB_PROJ PROJ, ZC_EB_PACK pack, Zc_Eb_Duty_Audit_Sheet sheet, zc_eb_plan plan where PROJ.proj_code = pack.proj_code and pack.entrust_code = sheet.sn and proj.proj_code = plan.proj_code and not exists (select Zc_Eb_Eval_Report.Pack_Code from Zc_Eb_Eval_Report Zc_Eb_Eval_Report where Zc_Eb_Eval_Report.Proj_Code = proj.proj_code and Zc_Eb_Eval_Report.Pack_Code = pack.Pack_Code) and sheet.attn = #zcText0# and PROJ.Status != 'cancel' PROJ.nd = #nd#

select master.PACK_CODE, master.PROJ_CODE, master.PUR_CONTENT, master.PACK_NAME, master.PACK_BUDGET, master.ENTRUST_CODE, master.IS_CHECK_QUALIFICATION, master.PUR_TYPE, master.ANALYSE_TYPE, master.BID_LOCATION, master.BID_DEPOSIT, master.IS_FAILED, master.TECH_REQUIRE, master.QUALIFICATION_REQUIRE, master.PACK_DESC, master.STATUS, master.IS_SELE_SUPPLIER, master.SELE_TYPE, master.SELE_NUM, master.IS_SHOW_BUDGET, master.FAILED_REASON, master.LAST_STATUS, e.* from ZC_EB_PACK master, ZC_EB_ENTRUST e where e.SN(+) = master.ENTRUST_CODE and master.Status!='0' and master.Status!='cancel' and not exists (select Zc_Eb_Eval_Report.Pack_Code from Zc_Eb_Eval_Report Zc_Eb_Eval_Report where Zc_Eb_Eval_Report.Proj_Code = master.proj_code and Zc_Eb_Eval_Report.Pack_Code = master.pack_code)
master.PROJ_CODE=#dattr1:VARCHAR#
order by to_number(master.PACK_CODE)
select distinct e.EXPERT_ID_CARD from V_ZC_EB_EXPERT E WHERE e.PROJ_CODE = #value#

select * from ZC_EB_EXPERT_CHENGNUO ZC_EB_EXPERT_CHENGNUO WHERE ZC_EB_EXPERT_CHENGNUO.PROJ_CODE = #projCode# AND ZC_EB_EXPERT_CHENGNUO.PACK_CODE=#packCode# AND ZC_EB_EXPERT_CHENGNUO.EXPERT_CODE=#expertCode#
sqlMap.update: update ZC_EB_EXPERT_CHENGNUO set IS_CHENGNUO = #chengNuo:VARCHAR#, EXPERT_NAME=#expertName:VARCHAR# where PROJ_CODE = #projCode:VARCHAR# and PACK_CODE = #packCode:VARCHAR# and EXPERT_CODE = #expertCode:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.delete: delete from ZC_EB_EXPERT_CHENGNUO where PROJ_CODE = #projCode:VARCHAR# and PACK_CODE = #packCode:VARCHAR# and EXPERT_CODE = #expertCode:VARCHAR#
